      • loginUserWithParameters

        public static void loginUserWithParameters(java.lang.String email,
                                           java.lang.String passwordStr,
                                           android.content.Context context,
                                           User.UserLoginResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Login with given E-mail and Password.
        Parameters:
        email - User's E-mail address
        pass - User's password
        context - Activity context
        responseHandler - Handler for Success or Failure of login

      • loginOrRegisterUserWithEmail

        public static void loginOrRegisterUserWithEmail(java.lang.String email,
                                                java.lang.String passOrNil,
                                                java.lang.String fullnameOrNil,
                                                java.lang.String zipCodeOrNil,
                                                android.content.Context context,
                                                User.UserLoginResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Try to login with given E-mail. If login was unsuccessful, try to register based only on e-mail address. Other values if null are set to their defaults. Should be used after 3-rd party application project login or registration. Important ! Any mistakes in login causing failure, may lead to unwanted registration, so loginOrRegisterUserWithEmail should be used with care
        Parameters:
        email - User's E-mail address
        passOrNil - User's password ( or null )
        fullnameOrNil - User's full name ( or null )
        zipCodeOrNil - User's zip code ( or null )
        context - Activity context
        responseHandler - Handler for Succes or Failure of login

      • registerUserWithParameters

        public static void registerUserWithParameters(java.lang.String login,
                                              java.lang.String password,
                                              java.lang.String fullnameOrNil,
                                              java.lang.String zipCodeOrNil,
                                              android.content.Context context,
                                              User.UserLoginResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Parameters:
        login - User's login
        password - User's password
        fullnameOrNil - User's full name ( or null )
        zipCodeOrNil - zipCodeOrNil User's zip code ( or null )
        context - Activity context
        responseHandler - Handler for Success or Failure of register

        public static void updateUserWithParameters(java.lang.String email,
                                            java.lang.String oldPassOrNil,

                                            java.lang.String fullnameOrNil,

                                            android.content.Context context,
                                            User.UserLoginResponseHandler responseHandler)
        Update account parameters
        Parameters:
        email - User's e-mail address
        oldPassOrNil - User's old password ( or null )

        fullnameOrNil - User's full name ( or null )
        zipCodeOrNil - User's full name ( or null )
        context - Activity context
        responseHandler - Handler for Success or Failure of register
